_sText:
Hi all,

i make a new version V3

- Fix lag server

Objective:
-----------
The two teams are separated by a large gate. 
To open the door, you must push the balls in the four holes. 

tips:
----

1- To push the ball more easily, use the arrows on the floor (for activating the arrows, press key Action).

2- The grenade box is open when your team opened the gate.

----------------------
laurentbubu.free.fr
